titles.title: Fairness for State and Local Workers Act
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for coverage under that Act of employees of State and local governments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary:
3/14/2007--Introduced.
Fairness for State and Local Workers Act - Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to provide for coverage under that Act of state and local government workers.
